title: dhru9
author: dhru9
content: Mina Protocol (Price prediction 2025) Next bull run is interesting for some poeple to know.If you invest in Mina you got to be intersted.What do you think future price of mina hold? Let me know what you so we go all the way up.Mina coin prediction for 2025 hereBut what about you. you can also take part and participate.

comments.author: Balmain
comments.body: I've heard some things about Mina. Investors say that the supply is unlimited and transaction blocks are processed slowly. But I think even the only solution they have created is very effective, I think it would be beneficial for many networks to reduce the blockchain size to just one tweet. I think that by 2025, there will be dapps working hard, and they will contribute to the ecosystem.

comments.author: Widdop37
comments.body: If supply is truly unlimited why did coinmarketcap has a total max supply information on it's website? I am still thinking of buying mina protocol and I have already added this project to my list but now this sound confusing, maybe I will do more research on the project first.

comments.author: Hold-n-play
comments.body: Yes, Mina is a promising project but right now we dont even know if BTC is going to hit another floor price in the next few weeks... I think its almost pointless to make such a long-term prediction.

comments.author: Sterbens
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on June 23, 2022, 10:01:51 AMMina Protocol (Price prediction 2025) Next bull run is interesting for some poeple to know.If you invest in Mina you got to be intersted.What do you think future price of mina hold? Let me know what you so we go all the way up. Not interested and don't know if it will have any value in taking the top spot. We are flocking to secure Bitcoin price positions and take more, more, and more. In times of decline like this, no one can guarantee anything from the altcoins back past the highs that have been reached.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on June 23, 2022, 10:01:51 AMBut what about you. you can also take part and participate. I bought this project at one time on Coinlist for 0.25$, I still keep it in my portfolio. There is hope that this project in the next bull run will grow, and will exceed its current ATH of $9.The mina protocol has the lightest blockchain and is really decentralized, the project also solves scalability issues and will allow for truly secure applications on the blockchain. Hopefully these features will expand the use of this protocol and as a consequence increase its price.

comments.author: Anonylz
comments.body: I heard about it but unfortunately couldn't participate from coinlist but bear market has given opportunity to buy it way cheaper than what it was trading few months back. Predicting alts future price is not easy because despite how good the project may be, market demand will determine the price. I would say since some people think web3 is the next big thing, it won't be a bas idea to scoup some mina for the next bull season.

comments.author: Grim149x
comments.body: Quote from: Balmain on June 23, 2022, 11:43:02 AMI've heard some things about Mina. Investors say that the supply is unlimited and transaction blocks are processed slowly. But I think even the only solution they have created is very effective, I think it would be beneficial for many networks to reduce the blockchain size to just one tweet. I think that by 2025, there will be dapps working hard, and they will contribute to the ecosystem. where is the source? Is that fud or truth if thats true mina protocol will not survive the bear market if that true it will be die project. Ihope thats not true

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: This coin is over valued with no utility usage. I know that people are thinking this si the best coin for now but they were not realized that if this is only selling so many gimmick. People are beliving if this coin will become another major coin. I remember when each of this coin worth more than 4 and this time it's less than a dollar. The market is still in a bad condition. I don't think this coin can wake up from the its bearish trend. it's impossible to be reversed from the market. Bitcoin and bearish trend are still dominating everything for now.

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: Quote from: dhru9 on June 23, 2022, 10:01:51 AMMina Protocol (Price prediction 2025) Next bull run is interesting for some poeple to know.If you invest in Mina you got to be intersted.What do you think future price of mina hold? Let me know what you so we go all the way up.Mina coin prediction for 2025 hereBut what about you. you can also take part and participate. Although I am not a person who often cares about it, I do know about it, with the current Mina ecosystem still very new, not many applications, and still in the early stages of development. Perhaps in the future, what this ecosystem needs to pay attention to is developing infrastructure pieces to help the ecosystem develop, because a high-rise building is only stable when it has a good enough foundation. In addition, to the vision of 2025, I will stay out of it because the main thing I care about is how BTC will change, rather than the solutions in this space.

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: In the next bull market, I think projects with metaverses and NFT tokens for these metaverses will be popular. The price of Mina can rise, but for this it is necessary that the manipulators buy back most of the coins, then it can repeat the growth of Solana.
